Crypto Wallet Tracker System

Real-time Ethereum & Bitcoin Portfolio Management with Advanced FIFO Tracking

System Architecture

Key Features

Real-Time Tracking

Monitors Ethereum and Bitcoin wallets every 15 minutes, automatically detecting and processing new transactions as they occur on the blockchain.

FIFO Cost Basis

Implements First-In-First-Out accounting for accurate profit/loss calculations, essential for tax compliance and portfolio performance tracking.

Gas Fee Management

Automatically tracks and deducts Ethereum gas fees from deposits, ensuring accurate balance calculations and true cost basis.

Organized Reporting

Automatically organizes transactions by month, generates detailed reports with client attribution, and maintains comprehensive audit trails.

Historical Price Data

Fetches accurate historical prices at transaction time for precise USD valuations, with fallback mechanisms for reliability.

Multi-Token Support

Tracks ETH, BTC, USDT, and USDC across multiple wallets with automatic token detection and proper decimal handling.

Automated Data Flow

Mempool API
